title: What are similar songs like 'Love Me Like You Do' that I may like? - Quora

response.answer_text: It seems you like romantic kind of songs try these ones. Ed sheeranGreen day-wake me up when sept. EndsSam smith-stay with me (dark child version)TLC-waterfallsAnd so many more I can suggest you.
